channel.title: Pray for irfan =(
channel.description:
hi this is h4xx0rz, irfan is going through a tough time right now. he is color-blind in one eye , totally blind in the other. he is going to have surgery, he has around a 30% chance of going blind in both eyes. the american doctors suck so hes going to Germany to have surgery, theres gonna be around 30 doctors and nurses. He is a good guy, and if it goes wrong he will never return to the forums. if you pray for him maybe his surgery will have a better chance of coming out good, feel free to copy my sig and put it in yours, irfan is a thoughtful guy, and i feel bad for him. i have been in this situation once, and i was scared as hell, i know how ti feels, i thought i was never gonna return. just give him hope, make a special sig. pray for him at night. he is a very special dude, once in a lifetime, caring thoughtful, and he may have to go thru life blind. i hope he sees the world as i do now. he gave me my first rep point and i was so happy, weve been close since i started and please pray for him. *NOTE* if you are not christian, then pray for the god of your choosing, if you are an atheist (follows no god) just be glad you do not have the same condition as him, and post a comment giving your good hopes
dearest regards and luck, h4xx0rz bobby

item.title: Pray for irfan =(

item.description:
@XxKanexX wrote:

FastBallz:

And Pray for Irfan?..Umm not everyone Prays…

Especially for someone we don’t know and arn’t close to. I only pray when i need to. This is not one of them situations.

item.title: Pray for irfan =(
item.dc:creator: @kloplop321 kloplop321
item.description:
@kloplop321 wrote:

I am a good frien of Irfan and IrFan has asked me on MSN to post that he is in a germany hospital hotel, he is high on the doctors gas stuff from earlyer, and he can’t post cuz this isn’t his computer and he has to use a proxy just to veiw the site. He also can’t post if you cant understand that, I also wish him good luck!

"(10:07 PM) |͇̿.͇̿M.͇̿.͇̿0.͇̿.͇̿3.͇͇̿̿|:
just something like that is appreciated

(10:08 PM) |͇̿.͇̿M.͇̿.͇̿0.͇̿.͇̿3.͇͇̿̿|:
ty
(10:08 PM) Kloplop321:
how about
(10:08 PM) Kloplop321:
I am a good frien of Irfan and IrFan has asked me on MSN to post that he is in a germany hospital hotel, he is high on the doctors gas stuff from earlyer, and he can’t post cuz this isn’t his computer and he has to use a proxy just to veiw the site. He also can’t post if you cant understand that, I also wish him good luck!

(10:08 PM) |͇̿.͇̿M.͇̿.͇̿0.͇̿.͇̿3.͇͇̿̿|:
uh

Okay i guess lol
(10:09 PM) |͇̿.͇̿M.͇̿.͇̿0.͇̿.͇̿3.͇͇̿̿|:

item.title: Pray for irfan =(
item.dc:creator: @irfan786 irfan786
item.description:
@irfan786 wrote:

[quote=“leader, post:56, topic:18166”][quote author=irfan786 link=topic=27146.msg320758#msg320758 date=1160957666]
Praying is working for me too, … I am no longer depressed as I was before.
[/quote]

That is good. May God be with you.[/quote]
May god be with us all :).

[quote=“Mr.Chris, post:57, topic:18166”][quote author=XxKanexX link=topic=27146.msg320337#msg320337 date=1160943446]

I’m in no way religous, but lately, if been praying for whats gone wrong for me to turn right. I think it is working, it’s getting so much more better at the moment.

Could just be a coincidence?
[/quote]

It most likely is, but I pray anyway. It makes me feel more, erm, safe, I suppose. Whenever I’m in a bad time, I take 5 minutes before I sleep, bow my head and hold my hands and pray.[/quote]
Same, I feel more secure.

Read full topic

item.title: Pray for irfan =(

I’m in no way religous, but lately, if been praying for whats gone wrong for me to turn right. I think it is working, it’s getting so much more better at the moment.
[/quote]
Could just be a coincidence?[/quote]

It most likely is, but I pray anyway. It makes me feel more, erm, safe, I suppose. Whenever I’m in a bad time, I take 5 minutes before I sleep, bow my head and hold my hands and pray.
